titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of June 1, 2021, as "Batten Disease Awareness Day".
Expressing support for the designation of June 1, 2021, as "Batten Disease Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Batten Disease Awareness Day. Batten disease refers to a group of inherited nervous system disorders that interfere with the body's ability to break down certain molecules.
